Hailing from Sweden The Soulshake Express are destined to become, yet another, phenomenal Swedish musical export.  Drawing influences from such rock legends as MC5, Deep Purple and ACDC as well as the more currant Wolfmother, Hellacopters and the Jon Spencer Blues Explosion, these retro rockers infuse their grooves with thundering guitars and a swirling organ.
